ðŸ“– Summary: Jujutsu is a Git-compatible version control system designed for ease of use and powerful history manipulation. It abstracts the user interface from the storage layer, allowing for different backends. It incorporates features from Git, Mercurial, and Darcs to provide a flexible and efficient version control experience.
